text:
For anyone who's ever thought of launching a course ... I'm building online and sharing the results as I go. Hope that my journey will inspire anyone who's thought of doing the same to JUST DO IT! :two_hearts:

<https://www.linkedin.com/posts/erinbalsa_contentmarketing-contentwriting-erin100-activity-6826843912494170112-T5jX>

attachments.title: Erin Balsa on LinkedIn: #contentmarketing #contentwriting #erin100
attachments.text: Yesterday I announced that my course was available for pre-order. In the spirit of building online, here are the results: DAY ONE :heavy_check_mark: Four orders at $109...

elements.text: For anyone who's ever thought of launching a course ... I'm building online and sharing the results as I go. Hope that my journey will inspire anyone who's thought of doing the same to JUST DO IT!

text:
Super excited to announce a very special 50th episode of Law, The Universe, And Everything with my very special guest, co-author of Building A StoryBrand - StoryBrand’s own Dr. J.J. Peterson!

Get to know the man behind the jacket in this wide ranging conversation as we talk about everything from J.J. growing up in Kenya to dancing in a Missy Elliott video and much more, including StoryBrand of course!

If you like this episode please leave a review on Apple Podcasts and share with your friends and network!

<https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/the-power-of-story-and-living-your-truth-with-dr-j-j-peterson/id1568993521?i=1000530539767>

attachments.title: ‎Law, The Universe, And Everything: The Power Of Story And Living Your Truth With Dr. J.J. Peterson on Apple Podcasts
attachments.text: ‎Show Law, The Universe, And Everything, Ep The Power Of Story And Living Your Truth With Dr. J.J. Peterson - Jul 30, 2021
attachments.fallback: Apple Podcasts: ‎Law, The Universe, And Everything: The Power Of Story And Living Your Truth With Dr. J.J. Peterson on Apple Podcasts

text:
Hi, 

Have you ever thought of driving real demand and sales opps directly from your B2B content? 

Then, you'll love this!

So, my friends at GrowthMentor invited me to host a live workshop last week on Product-Led Storytelling (a term I coined :relaxed:).

I went deep on how to go beyond regular content marketing and craft Product-Led Stories that shows (not tells) your ICPs how to overcome their problems with your product. 

The goal? 

Using the art of storytelling to attract, filter, engage, show, persuade, and directly convert them into new users or sales opps (AKA, real demand gen, not "leads."). 

[Humble brag: I think it made sense to many. That'll be the only reason why we've had 3 startups begin advanced talks on hiring us to train their teams on this approach]

But I'll let you be judge of that. 

Practical things you'll learn are:

1. What Product-Led Storytelling is.
2. How to rethink your content strategy.
3. How to rethink your SaaS sales funnels.
4. How to attract and filter your ICPs with each content piece.
5. How to engage and show with your content.
6. How to compel and convert directly from content.

<https://www.growthmentor.com/videos/product-led-storytelling/|https://www.growthmentor.com/videos/product-led-storytelling/>

attachments.title: Product-Led Storytelling: How to Capture Demand with Content | Growth Mentor
attachments.text: Product-led stories is how to ditch MQLs and still increase your pipeline with more qualified opportunities. Content is still an excellent way to attract, engage, amplify real business interest (not emails disguised as MQLs), and build your business. But the old approach to content cannot achieve those. And that’s where Product-Led Storytelling comes in. You’ll […]
attachments.fallback: Growth Mentor: Product-Led Storytelling: How to Capture Demand with Content | Growth Mentor
